name: Foundation
description: Foundation will have a utility for a fully decentralized protocol for private transactions on Ethereum. Trade anything. No registration, no hassle. Foundation's Vision is to grow the DeFi space while adhering to changing regulation and providing convenient utilities with privatization of their transactions. The goal of Foundation will always be to leave the vision and project decisions via DAO. You can submit proposals and they will be voted on by investors in the Foundation DAO site.
